comments: Good. I also tried 2 other highly rated similar apps and while those 2 gave pretty much the same all around result, this over had a vastly different result that the others for the highest frequency. I don't know if that means this one is more accurate than those 2, or less accurate than those 2.
Very good application to judge your hearing

Being a patient of SSHL SSD, I can say this is most appropriate app to understand your hearing ability. (If you know how to read audiometry graph well and good, the app takes care of it by displaying info screen).This is no nsense app, exactly does and says what your audiometry Doctor does and say. No confusion, excellent app.

Love this App and it is pretty accurate compared to all the tests I have done in my ENT office, the o ly problem is that you cannot keep a history of your tests. I have also recently changed my phone and it seems that at lower decibels the tone changes instead of going silent.
of the several apps ive tried this came out on top for being easy to use causing greater accuracy in recording the results....good work

comments: My aids are set to automatic at the moment with no individually selectable settings, but the app does allow me to change volume, check battery life etc. No problems connecting. I should add, after looking at a few hearing aid apps that some people seem to think these apps are universal - in my experience they are manufacturer specific. Why rate an app 1 star when you have downloaded the wrong app in the first place? This app is designed for UNITRON hearing aids, although it will work with Specsavers aids manufactured for them by Unitron.
Works for me, installed and connected without any problem.
Did pair easily with new hearing aids but doesn't do anything useful. Volume control didn't even work. Suggest you don't bother with this.
Terrible app. Vertually useless, does Very little and does that badly. If you're buying hearing aids avoid this manufacturers if you want remote control.

Not impressed!! Why am I forced to have GPS on just to turn up the volume. The app drains the phone until its dead then I can't operate the earpieces. What a stupid idea, not impressed!!,! If I could leave zero stars I would.

title: Thrive Hearing Control Beta
description:
Thrive Hearing Control Beta works seamlessly with sensor-enabled hearing aids like Livio Edge AI to give you full control of your hearing aids. Change settings easily, adjust volume, create customized memories and stream music or phone calls with the touch of a button.

The Thrive app gives you access to Healthable features like brain and body activity tracking. You can set goals and your Brain Score and Body Score will let you know how close you are to meeting them. Thrive also offers:

REMOTE CONTROL
Easily adjust your hearing aid volume and change between memories that were either created by you or your hearing professional.

PERSONALIZED MEMORIES
Create multiple custom memories via any of the customized options in the app. Memories can also be geotagged so your hearing aids will adjust automatically when you return to that location.

FALL DETECTION AND ALERTS
Designed to help you stay independent, falls can be detected, and alert messages sent to selected contacts.

BODY / BRAIN TRACKING
Track steps and other movements and set daily goals. Tracking fitness activities has been shown to inspire people to continue or increase their activity. Monitor hearing aid use and social engagement and set daily goals. This can encourage more social interaction which can positively impact brain health.

THRIVE ASSISTANT
You can ask questions about your hearing aids like, “how do I adjust volume?” or general questions like, “what’s the weather today?” and get quick answers.

TRANSLATE
This first-to-world feature helps you easily communicate with people who speak other languages.

THRIVE CARE COMPATIBLE
You can use the Thrive app to share helpful information like physical activity, hearing aid usage and social engagement with people you select who have the new Thrive Care app. This helps you maintain independence and provides peace of mind for the Thrive Care users you selected.

TRANSCRIBE
It’s like closed captioning for real life. Conversations are transcribed so you can read what's being said.

FIND MY HEARING AIDS
Easily locate lost hearing aids. A signal detector sends a stronger or weaker signal based on how close you are to the location of the hearing aids.

ACCESSORY CONTROL
Gives you easy control of hearing aid accessories.
 
The Thrive app works with hearing aids from Starkey, Audibel, NuEar, MicroTech and AGX Hearing. These hearing aids must be purchased from a hearing professional. All features are not available on all hearing aid styles. Check with your hearing professional for details.

The Thrive app runs on Android 7.0 or higher. The following phones have been tested for compatibility:
 
Samsung Galaxy® S10 Streams directly using Bluetooth® technology (requires Android 10)
Samsung Galaxy® S10+ Streams directly using Bluetooth® technology (requires Android 10)
Samsung Galaxy® S10e Streams directly using Bluetooth® technology (requires Android 10)

title: Hearing aid, Microphone
description:
DaMIC has the following features:
This feature must be used with speaker, headset or earphone.
Available in both wired and wireless(Bluetooth, WIFI).
Attach external speaker, headset or earphone before you speak.
Try using a sound effect. 
Enjoy the good sound of it.
DaMIC consists of two modes.

[Speaker Mode]
This mode is used as loudspeaker, megaphone or microphone.
1. structure: Connect speakers to the smartphone.
2. explication: 
   1) Touch the Start button in the first mode.
   2) Speaking into the lower part microphone.
   3) Using the volume keys to adjust the volume.
   4) Using as loudspeaker, megaphone or microphone.

[Headset Mode]
This mode is used as hearing aid or stethoscope.
1. structure: Connect headset or earphone to the smartphone.
2. explication: 
   1) Touch the Start button in the second mode.
   2) Place the phone in a suitable place. 
      (In pockets, On near the sound that you want to hear)
   3) Using the volume keys to adjust the volume.
   4) Using as hearing aid or stethoscope.

[Main Features]
  1. There is no functional limitations, is completely free.
  2. Fast response time.
  3. Audio Effects
     - Bass Boost, Equalizer, Reverb
  4. High Quality (CD Quality)
  5. Automatic gain control, automatic noise reduction function is enabled by default as.
  6. Run in background even when the phone is locked.
  7. An easy-to-use and user-friendly UI.
  
[Support]
  If you have an opinion on functions, bug report, trouble report and any other questions, please feel free to contact us by e-mail.
  We will solve the problems and respond to your e-mail as soon as possible.
  e-mail: SoomSoft@SoomSoft.com

title: touchControl
description:
Turn your mobile device into a remote control for your Signia hearing aids! The app enhances discretion by hiding the remote control within your mobile device without the need for additional hardware. Full control of your hearing aids looks as subtle as checking for a text message.

The app will only provide all the functions if configured by your hearing health specialist. The app is only compatible with the latest generation of Signia/Siemens 7bx, 5bx, 3bx, Orion 2, Sirion 2, Teneo and Teneo+ hearing aids. Click the Developer Website link at the bottom of this page for all compatible products.

App features:
• Change hearing programs without the need to touch your hearing aids.
• Change the volume easily and discreetly.
• Easily mute and unmute the hearing aids.
• Adjust bass & treble to balance the quality of sound.
• Easily manage the volume of your tinnitus program.
• Adjust the span and direction of the microphones (7px, 5px, 7bx and 5bx devices).
• Check the battery status of your hearing aids (7px, 5px and 3px devices).

Intended use:
The touchControl App is a tool whereby the patient can adjust convenience functions of a hearing aid, within a framework given by a hearing health specialist, e.g., ENT doctor, audiologist or acoustician.

Device compatibility:
The touchControl App is compatible with any Android device running Android 4.0 or higher public release. 

Hearing aid compatibility:
The touchControl App is only compatible with the latest generation of Signia/Siemens 7px, 5px, 3px, 7bx, 5bx, 3bx, Orion 2, Sirion 2, Teneo and Teneo+ hearing aids. A full list of compatible hearing aids can be found by clicking the 'Visit Website' link at the bottom of this page.

Control signals:
The touchControl app generates short control signals which are designed to be played through the devices speakers and may be audible.

To ensure correct operation and for safety reasons:
1. While using the app do not hold the loudspeaker of this device to your ears or the ears of others. 
2. While using the app do not use the device with headphones, headsets or other audio playback devices.

PLEASE CAREFULLY READ THE MANUAL OF THE HEARING AIDS BEFORE USING THIS APP.


Sivantos GmbH, Henri-Dunant-Strasse 100, 91058 Erlangen, Germany

summary: Turn your mobile device into a remote control for your hearing instruments!
comments: I have the Signia rechargable hearing aides They work great except for one major problem. They will not let me use my phone to make or receive calls or listen to music without an external speaker. I do have the speaker but it would be so much more convenient for direct connect to my Pixel phone. This app has not been updated in over two years. App will not let me raise volume in only one hearing aid at a time. Frustrated. Thank you Kristine Drumm

When I first got these hearing aids they I worked well. I just had to get used to them. The app that was put on when I first got them allowed me to change the volume separately for the left and right ear. Now the app appears to just change a general sound for both sides. And no you can't just change the volume and think it's going to be the same on each side because it isn't

10/18/2020, I've done everything Signia via email recommended and this app simple does not work. Had my hearing technician reset the app again and still the app will not work. The app simply does not work. It would be very professional of someone if you can get the app working correctly. Please advise what to do. I have a Samgung A50 phone. Thank you. 3/17/2020 Follow up, STIll not working. I followed your advice, didn't solve problem. I would appreciate some help.

bluetooth. compatible is only for iPhone which doesnt help android users. It shouldn't be hard to be able to have a bluetooth compatibility and in always on the phone and this would help out tremendously for the ones that actually prefer androids over iPhones. sorry but not many of us like iPhones as it is. I shouldn't have to buy another phone because of my hearing aids that I pay out of pocket for and have to pay out of pocket for an iPhone as well.

Switching from 1 to 2 is easy. Volume control also works well. Further control such as area covered is nonexistent. You can't direct the sound as you want and eliminate the extraneous sounds from all other sources. For me #1 is useless as it is ruined by any outside source. I find I am restricted to #2 solely. Big disappointment.

title: Oticon ON
description:
The Oticon ON App provides discreet remote control of your hearing aids, letting you adjust the volume of your hearing aids independently, switch between listening programs, keep an eye on your battery level or even help you find your hearing aids if you lose them. 
If enabled by your hearing care professional during the fitting session, the Oticon ON App can also let you access specific programs designed to help you move your attention away from your tinnitus. 

The Oticon ON App is also an easy way to handle wireless accessories paired with your hearing aids. Use it to control your Oticon TV Adapter, or devices such as Oticon EduMic or ConnectClip which can be used both for streaming and as remote microphones.

With the Oticon ON App, you can set personal listening goals and follow your daily hearing aid use through HearingFitness™. The Internet of Things feature lets you connect to a wide variety of Internet-connected solutions through the IFTTT service.

The Oticon ON App is compatible with all Oticon Bluetooth hearing aids.
We recommend using the latest version of Android OS.

To consult the latest list of compatible devices, please visit: https://www.oticon.com/support/compatibility

Please note the Oticon ON App will not enable you to use your hearing aids for direct audio streaming from your Android phone.

summary: Oticon ON
recentChanges:
Your Oticon ON App just got better!

To improve your experience, we regularly update the app to make it more reliable and easier to use.

In this release, we have listened to your feedback and added a new feature allowing you to manage your TV Adapters, and easily switch between them in the app.

Thank you for using the Oticon ON App!
comments: Update 10/9/20 Upgraded to Galaxy S10+ . Now the app only sees 1 of the aids. Troubleshooting is useless and Oticon does not have a Support number. Sad my hearing remains diminished! Won't pair with Bluetooth I use a Samsung Galaxy S5 mobile and a Samsung Chromebook Plus. This app just will not pair with Bluetooth no matter what I do. I remove and re-insert batteries, turn Bluetooth off and on again...nothing works. The user manual does not say much about this and only references Apple IOS.

I very much like the funtionality but this app is terrible with its BT connection. Pairing to my LG (less than 2 yrs old) is extremly difficult and unreliable. I dont belive Oticon is properly supporting android users like it does with apple phones. Also the BT connection to the TV is not reliable. Also why cant you stream phone calls and music without the need for the connect clip, which is awkward to use??. Apple users do not need a connect clip.

Hi, I've used this app for about 2 weeks now and would like to leave some tips and requests to its product team. My phone, Android, is a Samsung, less than 1 year old. 1. the app does not capture accurately the battery usage and loss. The % of use does not decrease daily. I get a replacement notice only when it is basically dead, when the device beeps. 2. the Hearing Fitness area also does not capture accurately the hours I use the device. For most days, it counts much less time than I used it (for instance, I use 10 hs and it counts 2hs.). It would be nice to see these two features working well. Thanks.

The app is nice. Works fine on my Samsung Galaxy J5 Pro (2017). Connected by turning on Bluetooth, starting the app, followed the prompts (open and closing the battery compartment when told), and it all connected. What would be nice, now, would be to enable audio pass through so when playing audio (through music apps or audiobooks) or video (e.g. YouTube) that it came through on the hearing aid. I'm not sure why this is taking so long to achieve since audio passthrough on Bluetooth is something that has been a capability for a long time now. Plus, Android occupies are fair size of the market, and not everyone has iPhones (or can afford them). So, please, we are literally begging you, enable media support/audio pass through for hearing aids connected to android phones (note: no, getting a connect clip is not the answer, as this another device to carry that can quite easily be lost).

21 October 2020. This issue has reappeared. Tried reinstall with no success. App appears to be broken in latest update on Galaxy S10. When I open the app I see a gray rectangle and nothing else. Sound control and listening environment settings in notification area still work. Pairing works too.

title: Ear Agent Pro : Super hearing app
description:
Super hearing app with live listening and amplified sound from mic to ear or super Hearing Aid

Big Ear Agent is an app helps you to hear better by turning your mobile phone to a powerful listening device...you can use it if you forget your hearing aid device in the goal to improve your hearing.

Big Ear Agent with a deep live hearing is a Super Hearing App, simple and amazing, you need just to connect your headphones or earphones (bluetooth device also working with this app), then click on the power button, if the sound is hight or low ajust your volume control just next to the power button.

to improve your hearing or amplify the sound you can use the equalizer, also there is a lot of features in this app like volumne boost, bass boost, noise reducer and autogain control (Automatic adjustment for volume level).

Big Ear Agent Pro with live deep Hearing amplifies sound from your devices microphone directly to your ears through headphones.

With Big  Ear Agent the app can work in background without needing to let your phone always on, also you can record all what you hearing in a folder an listen it again if lost to hear somthing.

How to use :

1- Connect your headphones or earphones (bluetooth devices works also), 
2-Click on the power button,
3- if the sound is not clear or hight/low you can ajust the volume control and equalizer

title: Handy Hearing
description:
Android app that Allows you listen through your microphone when wearing inEar(or other noise cancelling)Headphones. With this app you can hear temporarily if you think someone's talking to you, without having to remove your headphones or stop the music. 

It comes with a toggle button to turn microphone input on/off, and its own volume slider! 
With this you can always hear regardless of how loud your surroundings are or how loud your audio is.

It also works in background!

title: Signia App
description:
The Signia app gives you everything you need to enjoy your hearing aids to the full, and all tailored to your personal preferences: audio streaming, remote control and remote support*. All you need is your smartphone.

Easy to use, it lets you discreetly control the hearing program, the volume and other settings.

With the Signia app, you can also stay in touch with your Hearing Care Professional and get support when you need it – even when you can't visit him/her personally*.

*feature availability may vary according to hearing aid model and TeleCare availability in your country.

PLEASE READ THE USER GUIDE OF YOUR HEARING AIDS BEFORE USING THIS APP.

For the optimal stability of the app while using it with our Bluetooth hearing aids we recommend the Android devices listed on our website: https://www.signia-hearing.com/signia-app/

summary: You're in control
recentChanges: Bugfixes and performance improvements.
comments: All adjustments are lost when you attempt to view previous settings. The batteries run down in 3 days, even when disabled during sleep hours. I have 30 days to decide on a full refund of my $6,800.00. If these issues are not resolved within that time period my money will be better spent on a different company's product.

Works . . . Sometimes. Clunky. "Pairing" only produces a tone my left ear; I assume that this is enough since the volume setting works for both. But only when it works! Trying repeated small adjustments caused it to stop responding, and the app had to be restarted to continue. I'm not impressed by the tone control, but it can be used to cut the uncomfortable treble in some situations. I had no expectation of taking calls from the phone, since my hearing aids aren't Bluetooth equipped.

Disappointed. I have worn hearing aids for 12 years. After spending over $35,000.00 over 12 years I thought these Hearing aids were going to be the best. Not so. I am continuously adjusting. The app helps somewhat but the it does not keep the adjustments. I have to continually readjust. My audiologist works well with me but I don't like going in all the time. Wish I had not bought them.

I hate this app! I have to reconnect it every time it opens and that is really frustrating. It looses the settings and has to be reset every time. Please Signia, fix this app and make it functional. I would also like to see independent volume controls for left and right.

Not that great, the sound volume always get back to 8 if you shot down or change, doesn't hold the volume ## on the same level , hope get better improvement.The earing aids in my personal opinion should be the best one, for this price almost $8000, but is NOT, I don't believe exist earing aids that good to help to improve hearing.My android doesn't work well with this earing aids 😒, they said works better with iPhone, really??? So I have to change my android with iPhone? Not happy

title: TruLink Hearing Control
description:
With TruLink Hearing Control, people with hearing loss can go anywhere and do everything more conveniently than ever before. That’s because TruLink seamlessly connects your hearing aids to your Android phone — so you can easily adjust volume, memories, and even customize the performance to unique situations. 

TruLink works with specific hearing aids from Starkey, Audibel, NuEar, MicroTech and AGX Hearing. These hearing aids must be purchased from a hearing care professional. Please go to trulinkhearing.com to locate a professional near you.

Main Features:
• Lets you control your hearing aid volume and memories via your phone 
• Lets you personalize and geo-tag memories to match what you do and where you go
• Can change memories automatically based on personalized geo-tags (e.g. changes to Coffee Shop memory when you walk into a Coffee Shop)
• Adapts automatically when you travel in a car
• Find a lost or misplaced hearing aid

*Currently supported on: 
- Samsung Galaxy® S9 running Android OS 8.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S8 running Android OS 7.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S7 running Android OS 6.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S6 running Android OS 5.0
- Samsung Galaxy® S4 or S5 running Android OS 4.4.4
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 8 running Android OS 7.0
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 7 running Android OS 6.0
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 5 running Android OS 5.1.1
- Samsung Galaxy® Note 3 or Note 4 running Android OS 5.0
- HTC M10 running Android OS 6.0
- HTC M7 & M8 running Android OS 5.0
- Pixel 2 & Pixel 2 XL running Android OS 8.0
- Pixel & Pixel XL running Android OS 7.0
- Nexus 5x & 6p running Android OS 6.0

TruLink for Android does not provide streaming at this time.

title: Chatable - Focus your Hearing, Remove Distraction
description:
Chatable is the easy way to focus on speech. If you have ADHD, ADD, Autism, Dyslexia or Hearing loss, then this app is perfect for you. Try free now. 

Chatable improves attention by helping you focus on speech.  Our A.I. removes background noise and improves your concentration for one to one conversation.  Try for free today.  

“Chatable will be majorly life changing for many people.” - European Audiologist of the Year 2019, Paula Cooke
 
Chatable uses headphones to turn your smartphone into a listening device that will boost volume of speech and remove distracting or overwhelming background noise. The result is, easier listening, more productive conversations, improved focus, lower stress levels and more enjoyable TV listening

Who is Chatable For? 

Chatable may help a diverse range of hearing, neurodevelopmental and processing disorders. 

Used with a listening device, Chatable can help with: 
- Processing and learning disorders such as ADHD, APD and Dyslexia
- Communication and behaviour disorders affected by listening and concentration such as Autism (Autism Spectrum Disorder) and Aspergers 
- Mild, moderate, severe, profound hearing loss
- Temporary relief from Tinnitus or background noise
 
For neurodevelopmental and processing disorders, we recommend you use noise cancelling headphones with the app for optimal experience. 

What is Chatable for? 

- Hearing one to one conversation 
- Coping in noisy and overwhelming environments 
- Improve attention and focus in the classroom / lecture 
- Use Chatable as a remote microphone or listening device
- Listening to the television or the radio, as a voice sound amplifier or listening device
- Hearing someone through facemasks 
- Listening better at work meetings
- Enhancing your hearing aid or cochlear implant  
- A backup hearing aid
 
Chatable is easy to set up and use, with no hearing test, doctor appointment, or audiologist calibration needed. Simply connect to your wired headphones, or existing hearing aid or listening device. 
 
What can you expect from Chatable? 
- Enhances focus on conversation 
- Removes stressful noise, relax easier and relieve Tinnitus
- Reduces listening effort 
- Improves speech processing 
- Less reliance on lipreading 
- Ability to listen from a distance 
- Listen to the TV at lower volume 
- Reduced usage of captions for the TV
 
You can see all our testimonials here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJMyHV-vL5zefAu7I0x0RDA/videos

How does it work?


Dr. Andy Simpson, pioneer in auditory neuroscience and AI, designed and engineered VOXimity™, our proprietary technology, to help people focus on conversation and reduce the volume of background noise. 

If you want to learn more about the invention of VOXimity™, check out the Chatable blog: https://blog.chatableapps.com/index.php/2020/01/02/the-invention-of-chatableapps

Chatable is free to install and use. Enjoy 100 minutes of free use every month, and subscribe for unlimited access.

Chatable is not a hearing aid. This is an app that uses the mobile platform for recording audio and replaying audio with or without amplification, or other similar functionalities and that uses the mobile platform to translate unintelligible speech for better clarity.

title: ReSound Smart
description:
﻿The ReSound Smart™ app is compatible with the following hearing aids: 
•	ReSound LiNX2™
•	ReSound LiNX™
•	ReSound LiNX TS™
•	ReSound ENZO2™
•	ReSound ENZO™
•	ReSound UpSmart™


The ReSound Smart app lets you control your hearing aids directly from your mobile device. You can change programs, and make simple or more advanced sound adjustments and save them as favorites. The app helps you learn what you can do and how to do it. It can even help you find your hearing aids if you lose them. 


Notes: Please contact your local ReSound representative for product and feature availability in your market. We recommend that the hearing aids run the latest software version. If in doubt, please contact your hearing care professional.


ReSound Smart mobile device compatibility:
Please consult the ReSound app website for up-to-date compatibility information: www.resound.com/compatibility 


Use the ReSound Smart app to: 
•	Adjust volume settings on your hearing aids
•	Mute your hearing aids
•	Adjust volume of your optionally acquired ReSound streaming accessories
•	Adjust speech focus as well as noise and wind-noise levels with Sound Enhancer (feature availability depends on your hearing aid model and the fitting by your hearing care professional) 
•	Change manual and streamer programs
•	Edit and personalize program names 
•	Adjust treble, middle and bass tones to your preferences
•	Save your preferred settings as a Favorite – you can even tag to a location
•	Help locate lost or misplaced hearing aids
•	Tinnitus manager: Adjust sound variation and frequency of the Tinnitus Sound Generator. Select Nature Sounds (feature availability depends on your hearing aid model and the fitting by your hearing care professional)

comments: I have only one working hearing aid because, I no longer wear the left side hearing aid. Because of this the app needs both aids to be able to connect to the right side aid. Note: I wear a cochlear processor for the left ear that is compatible with my ReSound phone clip but not the ReSound Smart App.
Used to work fine. Now sticks on demo. Won't pair with my hearing aids. Update...Resound offered advise, app must have been improved, things work as they are supposed to.
Had to install on my wife's phone for some reason this will not install on a new one plus phone. Would be nice if they would updated for the new phones.

Every product can have a problem - the measure of a company is how they respond. I noted a problem earlier - since then the team in ReSound have been excellent and attentive. They stayed with me and helped until a solution was found - was down to my Bluetooth connection. Great product, great app and great support. Recommended.

It can be a little touchy about loosing connection with on or both hearing aids but all in all a great app. I wish they would add ability to gear phone calls through your hearing devices tho. That's kind of the point isnt it?

summary: Hearing Assist: for your hearing and sound control device.
developerAddress: Yihai Plaza West Building 12a, Chuangye Road, Nanshan DistrictShenzhen, - 51805
recentChanges: Catch some exceptions of DBMeter to improve the stabilities.
comments: I like the fact that I can make these hearing aids applicable to different environments. I really like to have control on the various frequency adjustments. I love the hearing test and optimization. This is how you should have control over your hearing aids.

I had a pair of $4,000.00 hearing aids for a 45 day free trial. None of the user programmable features worked with an Android phone. The HA-802 with this app is far superior to the $4,000.00 hearing aids. Setup and operation is easy, straightforward and gives all of the necessary adjustments needed to customize for individual preferences.

The app is quite impressive. I do wish the blue tooth coupling worked better. The phone doesn't stay coupled even though it remains well within the 50 ft required distance. Almost every time, if over several hours, when I want to change the mode or the volume in a mode the app has to recouple to the hearing amplifiers in both ears instead of running in the background and being ready for a change. The delay is quite annoying.
Have had them for a week. Still getting used to them but, so far this App and HA-802s are working great. I'll update again in a few weeks.
Would have given 5 stars, but no way of saving custom frequency band settings for different surroundings.

title: HearMax Super Hearing Aid Amplifier
description:
HearMax is the ultimate super hearing aid and hearing amplifier to amplify and boost sound from surroundings for better hearing or super hearing with your ears using headset, headphone, earbuds and earphones.

The hearing aid features of HearMax make it possible to amplify sound by placing your phone near sound sources such as Speaker, Television, Radio, Laptop, etc.

HearMax Super Hearing Aid & Hearing Amplifier helps with hearing loss or hearing problems so you can hear better, communicate more effectively, and eliminate danger.

The hearing amplifier utilizes the powerful audio features of android to bring you super hearing based on your phone's capabilities.

HearMax is the latest super hearing aid app and hearing amplifier designed for amplified hearing on Android. Use this sound amplifier to boost sound for your ears.

WHY HEARMAX?
1. Hear better during one-on-one conversations and meetings.
2. Ear agent for super hearing during an event where the speaker is far away from you.
3. Amplify and listen to sound from your Television, Radio, Laptop while you relax, work out, cook, or do your daily tasks from a far distance.
4. Hearing aid to restore your hearing to normal levels against hearing loss.
5. Use as hearing aid when you lose your medically prescribed hearing aid.
6. Experience the power of a super hearing ear agent app for android.

HEARMAX FEATURES:
1. High-Quality Sound Feedback
2. Sound Amplifier & Ear Agent
3. Cancellation of Acoustic Echo (AEC)
4. Equalizer & Presets
5. Bass Booster (BB)
6. Automatic Gain Control (AGC)
7. Graphic Virtualizer
8. MP3 Sound Recorder
9. Volume Controller
10. Noise Suppression
11. Wave Visualizer
12. Save your configurations and preferences
13. Regular updates with new features, bug-fixes and your suggestions.

HOW TO USE HEARMAX:
1. Plug-in and connect headset or earphones to your smartphone. If you're using a wireless headset, make sure Bluetooth is turned on and your hearing device is properly connected to your phone. You can play music to test functionality.

2. Launch HearMax super hearing aid app for android and tap "Listen" for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound into your headset!

3. Put your phone near any source of sound for the hearing amplifier to capture and amplify sound in real-time.

4. Listen to the amplified sound using your listening device connected to this ear agent.

Disclaimer: Use HearMax super hearing aid app and hearing amplifier for android for the purpose of amplified hearing, not as a replacement for your prescribed medical hearing aid device from your audiologist. Consult your physician if you're encountering any hearing difficulty.

title: Deaf Communication (talk to deaf& hard of hearing)
description:
Gone are the days when you needed to write down everything on a piece of paper or learn sign languages to communicate with deaf and hearing impaired people.This speech to text app was made specifically as a conversation platform and not as a speech dictation platform to communicate efficiently and as quickly as possible with people who don't know sign language.Whenever you want to hear something from someone,just tell them to speak to the phone,the app then automatically generates the voice into text so that you can read what they are trying say.Also,the app deletes the previous text automatically when they say something new(So that it doesn't seem like you are reading a book with a bunch of text).if you want talk back then write on the app whatever you want to say and press the speaker button(on the right side of the mic button) and it will generate the text to speech.


Features:
-No more tan 3 ads per day
=Two way communication(speech to text and text to speech).
-it supports over 140 different languages
-Users are given the freedom of selecting a text size of their own choice
-There is an offline mode to access the voice to text app offline by downloading and installing languages(only in pro version)
-Users can copy the text to clipboard
-A simple and beautiful user interface.

title: Mimi Hearing Test
description:
The Mimi Hearing Test is a quick, reliable way to explore your hearing ability. Mimi’s hearing test on iOS has been ranked as the #1 hearing test for several years. Now we are bringing a reliable hearing test to Android. Because of the complications that the wide variety of devices and headphones bring, we have developed a new paradigm that works optimally for Android devices. A paradigm that does not require calibration. With it we test how you hear in actual daily life, because let’s face it, how often are you trying to hear a pure tone at the quietest level possible? 

This test focuses on how you hear in noisy situations; like how you hear in a noisy restaurant or how well you’re able to pick out an instrument in a complex musical piece. 

The paradigm is the first of its kind to reach the PlayStore. It is still in development, continuing to undergo research improvements in how we test and provide insights to you, the user. The more tests people take, the better our test will become. So a big thanks to our dedicated Mimi users who support us in this endeavor!

Facts and figures:
Advanced testing technology - The test itself is a mask threshold (MT) test. This technology tests your ability to differentiate a signal in background noise, simulating a similar environment which your ears must navigate in a crowded area.
Headphone independent - The nature of the hearing test allows you to test your ears with any headphones, no need for calibration.
Tangible insights - We have turned your hearing data into insights, to help you reflect on your hearing health.
The frequency which you will test is 4 kHz, as this has proven to be indicative of your overall hearing ability. 

We are working on bringing you deeper insights, a broader frequency range, and updates to the profile shortly. So, stay tuned, enjoy and happy testing!

If you have feedback, please contact us via hello@mimi.io.

title: Signia Hearing Test
description:
Our Hearing Test app, which has been developed by our audiology experts, allows you to test your hearing quickly and easily. This test is completely independent of language, so you can use it reliably no matter what language you’re most comfortable with.

How the test works
The Hearing Test examines how well you can detect words with background noise. This is based on the knowledge that individuals with hearing loss have greater difficulty understanding speech in noisy environments, such as restaurants or railway stations. 

During the test, you will hear imaginary words with fluctuating background noise. Your task is to select the word you heard from several options displayed on your screen. Depending on your answers, the background noise will be adjusted. Unlike similar hearing tests, the volume setting is not crucial. 

The test consists of 9 test items per ear and determines how well you can understand speech in background noise. By comparing your results with the average score of other listeners, the program determines your level of hearing. However, the results of the Hearing Test are not intended to replace an official diagnosis. This can only be provided by a qualified hearing care professional.

Compatible with Android 4.2.0 and higher.

Sivantos Pte. Ltd. is a Trademark Licensee of Siemens AG

title: Hearing Age Test
description:
Test how old your ears are using our simple app.

Typically the range of human hearing is 20 - 20,000 Hz. However, age and prolonged exposure to loud sounds can significantly lower your ability to hear high frequency. 
This app will help you determine the maximum frequency you can hear, and evaluate your hearing age.

Features:
- generates tones ranging from 0 - 20,000 Hz.
- evaluate the hearing age, using the maximum audible frequency.

Note:
This mobile app is intended for informational, education purposes only. It is not, and is not intended, for use in the diagnosis and should not replace hearing test conducted by a specialist.

Please test your volume before starting the app and avoid loud volume to prevent hearing damage.

1. I turn the volume up all the way to hear above 14khz. 2. I stop the test. 3. AN UNANNOUNCED VIDEO AD STARTS PLAYING AT MAX VOLUME. 4. I get my test result reading "You have the hearing of a 21 year old, and can hear up to 18162 hz" 5. R.I.P. HEADPHONE USER? My head is RINGING. It feels like a FLASHBANG EXPLOSION went off. 6. Next result should read "You have the hearing of a 150 year old, and can hear 0 hz" 7. TL;DR this app made me deaf. Thanks I now know my hearing range.
After test, ad shows up and after leaves a blank screen. No results. Nothing.

title: myControl App
description:
The myControl App gives you effortless hearing tailored to your individual lifestyle. It sends information to your hearing aids for the best possible hearing while you are on the move, ensuring your relaxation and safety whatever comes your way.

The myControl App enables the patient to personalize Signia Hearing Aids with the following functions if configured by a Hearing Care Professional:

Volume control
Program change
Spatial Configurator
Sound Balance
Sound Exposure
Voice Activity
Remote Microphone
Battery Status
Hearing Aid System Sounds

Compatible Hearing Aids:

Signia Pure 13 Nx
Signia Motion 13 Nx
Signia Pure 13 BT px
Signia Pure Charge&Go Nx 
Signia Motion 13 P Nx
Signia Pure 13 [T]  Nx

recentChanges:
Bugfixes and improvements in the pairing process,
improvements in data handling
comments: It works when it's connected to the hearing aids, BUT the app stops working for no apparent reason. I have to restart my phone throughout the day, then it works again. It's not bluetooth as that is always on. Not sure if it's a glitch in the app or not, but beware of that flaw, the settings you have set revert to something else and the hearing aids don't seem to work the way they should. This app is actually WORTHLESS!!

It's better than nothing, but not by much. If you have only one Bluetooth device ( other than your hearing aids), you can leave it connected all the time, and the app works ok. But if you live in a multi-bluetooth world, switching between the devices is a huge pain in the petunia. Sometime the only solution is to power off the phone and all the devices, then start pairing with the device you want to use. In particular I want to use an Android phone and Streamline TV... but that's 2 devices.

What the hell happened? When I first installed the app back in March everything worked, it was awsome. Now nothing, I can't change the hearing situations (theater, cafe, outdoors), everything is grayed out and can't be used. I've email the app developers and no response. I deleted it, reinstalled it, still the same. The app is basically now useless and no one is helping.

The options reallyreally work! I was skeptical at first....but when I played with the options I was impressed with the improvement...especially with the tv and group conversations... thanks much...my friends saw the difference right away! I struggle much less to hear ....and am more connected to what's being discussed!

Very useful being able to control my hearing aids from my phone. Would like it if hearing volume could be controlled by incrementally clicks, rather than by sliding. Everything else is great. Latest version doesn't have the audible battery test. I miss hearing the three beeps each morning as a hearing aid test.

title: The mechanism of hearing educational VR 3D
description:
The ear and the mechanism of hearing 3D
Ears convert the vibrations of air into electric signals which are then processed by the brain.

Our 3D scenes have been designed for students between 8 and 18 years of age but can be interesting for everyone.   

Available languages:  English, American English, Deutsch, Français, Español, Русский, العربية, 日本語, 中文, 한국어, Italiano, Português, Svenska, Türkçe, Nederlands, Norsk, Polski, Magyar

With the mozaik3D App, available in the Google Play store, you can access more than 1200 similar 3D scenes.

Mozaik Interactive 3D
Our fully interactive scenes can be rotated, enlarged or viewed from pre-set angles. With the predefined views, you can easily navigate through the complex scenes. Most of our 3D scenes include narrations and built-in animations. They also contain captions, entertaining animated quizzes and other visual elements. The 3D scenes are available in several languages, which also offers an opportunity to learn and practice foreign languages. 

Usage and navigation
Rotate the scene by dragging your finger. 
Zoom the scene in or out by pinching with your fingers. 
Pan the view by dragging with three fingers.
Tap the buttons at the bottom to switch between predefined views.
You can change the language and set other functions in the context menu.
The context menu can be accessed by touching the bottom corners.
Activate VR mode by pressing the VR goggles icon in the bottom right corner.
In VR mode, tilt your head to right or left display the navigation panel.

comments: I am a retired R.N. and found your software incredible! I wish this kind of software was available when I was a student nurse!! It would have increased our knowledge base of the healthy body, the disease process and how it affects the healthy body. Also how the body responds to medication and medical treatment. Well done ✔ goes to the developers and this is something I don't normally do!
A very good app and very helpful about ear 👂 study and the animations are really awesome.. The video is very helpful and sounds are also good… thanks for making that great app😍

Brilliant application, it's great for learning about ear anatomy. Unfortunately I rare it a 4 star due to its lack of information(in other terms, it doesn't have everything you need to know about ear anatomy. For instance, the ear drum is often referred to as the timmpanic membrane). In conclusion. The app isn't truly bad, however I would rather recommend "Human Anatomy Atlas 2018/2019"

I didn't stay for long since I'm 13 but I've always had hearing problems and I've had operations and I've got one coming up in January, this has helped me understand the hearing mechanism a bit better, team, can you add animations that shows whatever surgeries that can be performed on the ear, I think it would be nice to know what goes on during my surgery but also see other surgeries that have happened on others also with hearing problems
Its a is an amazing game i like how you can learn from the ear and i like the quality and if you add an simlator for game version

title: ReSound Smart 3D
description:
﻿The ReSound Smart 3D™ app is compatible with the following hearing aids: 
•	ReSound ONE™
•	ReSound LiNX Quattro™
•	ReSound LiNX 3D™ 
•	ReSound ENZO 3D™ 
•	ReSound ENZO Q™


The ReSound Smart 3D app lets you control your hearing aids directly from your mobile device. You can change programs, and make simple or more advanced sound adjustments and save them as favorites. The app helps you learn what you can do and how to do it. It can even help you find your hearing aids if you lose them. Last, but not least, you can have your hearing care professional update your hearing aid programs and send you new hearing aid software without taking a trip to the clinic.


Notes: Please contact your local ReSound representative for product and feature availability in your market. We recommend that the hearing aids run the latest software version. If in doubt, please contact your hearing care professional.


ReSound Smart 3D mobile device compatibility:
Please consult the ReSound app website for up-to-date compatibility information: www.resound.com/compatibility 


Use the ReSound Smart 3D app to: 
•	Connect your ReSound ONE hearing aids to compatible Android devices for direct audio streaming
•	Enjoy optimization anywhere with ReSound Assist: Request help with your hearing aid settings from your hearing care professional and receive new settings and software updates. 


And use these direct control and personalization options:
•	Adjust volume settings on your hearing aids
•	Mute your hearing aids
•	Adjust volume of your optionally acquired ReSound streaming accessories
•	Adjust speech focus as well as noise and wind-noise levels with Sound Enhancer (feature availability depends on your hearing aid model and the fitting by your hearing care professional) 
•	Change manual and streamer programs
•	Edit and personalize program names 
•	Adjust treble, middle and bass tones to your preferences
•	Save your preferred settings as a Favorite – you can even tag to a location
•	Monitor the battery status of your rechargeable hearing aids
•	Help locate lost or misplaced hearing aids
•	Tinnitus manager: Adjust sound variation and frequency of the Tinnitus Sound Generator. Select Nature Sounds (feature availability depends on your hearing aid model and the fitting by your hearing care professional)


For more information please visit www.resound.com/smart3Dapp or the support site www.resound.com/help/apps/smart-3d

recentChanges:
﻿The Smart3D App is compatible with our brand-new product hearing aid family Resound ONE™

Support of video calls with your Audiologist for remote finetuning of your hearing aids has been added. Ask your Audiologist for availability.

The update also includes improvements to stability and connectivity.
comments: My hearing aid is pairing but only the system sounds can be played through my hearing aid while sounds from music and media come through my phone's speaker. Update: Unfortunately, just learned that my hearing aid (ENZO 3D) is compatible with iPhone only. However, I will be eligible for an upgrade in 2021 and by then, I'll be able to get a new pair of ReSound ENZO Q.

When it works it is great but the Bluetooth connection is totally unreliable. Sometimes only the streaming function works and the hearing aids will not connect to your phone or only one of the two connects. I reloaded the app but after a few days of perfect operation the streaming function went away but the hearing aids connect each time.

Resound ONE works great as I only have hearing loss in my left ear. However pairing with Android the Bluetooth settings do not give you an option to turn off the call and audio streaming like other bluetooth devices. I have to manually turn off bluetooth on every call and have to turn off bluetooth all together for watching anything even short videos to get sound out of the phone and not my single Resound ONE device. Please help!

Finally have a phone (Google Pixel 4A) and Android version (11) allowing full use of this app with my Resound Preza (Costco) hearing aids. Phone ringing and call audio, video/music players, notification sounds..they all come to my HAs. Audio from Resound TV-2 streamer devices has lower priority, so that the audio stream fades if another sound source becomes active (e.g. notification chirp) and then resumes when the higher priority sound completes. And I don't have to use a phone clip.

Enjoy the app and sound from TV Streamer 2 with my GN hearing aids. Recently however, my S9+ phone calls and media player only send audio to the right aid. About a month ago both aids worked with the phone. I get much better comprehension (25%) and enjoyment with both aids receiving sound. My wish is to have this android glitch corrected. Thank you for this nice product. Update: simple instructions from tech support fixed my android problems, many thanks Resound Tech Support Rocks!

comments: Very frustrating app. If you close it and then restart it sometimes won't connect to the hearing aids, even though it was connected before, which makes it useless. Instructions for pairing are very unclear, and don't work.

App worked great for a few weeks. Now every time I connect only one hearing aid connects. Sometimes the left sometimes the right. Very frustrating as when it worked it was very useful for making adjustments and getting settings changed remotely.
It's a con. Nothing it shows in the demo mode exists in the actual mode. The website doesn't display correctly on Android screen, half page is off screen. I can't control anything except mute.
Very happy with this hearing aid app Much better than the first one I had.
This app was specified by my audiologist to control my new danalogic ambio hearing aids. It connects reliably and performs faultlessly...recommended!

title: Superior Sounding Waves
description:
***PLEASE NOTE *** HEADPHONES REQUIRED.
 Failure to use headphones will result in awful audio feedback. You have been warned!

This app that attempts to improve your hearing with power from Android devise. Depending on how good your phone is, it can become a high-powered listening device (like a hearing aid).

Fitting a hearing aid is not like buying glasses. Your hearing has decreased slowly over a long time and your brain was able to compensate. You only start noticing that you have a hearing problem, when your brain is at it's wits' end. Using a hearing aid will make noises explode in your head, because all compensation mechanisms are set to maximum. Please give your brain a few weeks time to re-calibrate it's audio system...

Whether you want to listen to nature, have a conversation, or just hear the TV better, this app aims to give you superior hearing and improve what you hear. There's more going on around you than you might realise. It's time to hear it and be amazed.

** Features **
- Control in the volume, pitch, sensitivity, stereo pan, spatial blend 2D/3D...
- 11 Options To Create Your Own Effect.
- 26 Audio Reverb Zone Effects.
- 4 Advanced Audio Filters.
- All Options Documentation.

NOTE : HEADPHONES REQUIRED. Failure to use headphones will result in awful audio feedback. You have been warned!

***MORE INFO***
Priority : Determines the priority of this audio source among all the ones that coexist in the scene. 
(Priority: 0 = most important. 256 = least important. Default = 128.). 
Use 0 for music tracks to avoid it getting occasionally swapped out.
Volume : How loud the sound is at a distance of one world unit (one meter) from the Audio Listener.
Pitch : Amount of change in pitch due to slowdown/speed up of the Audio Clip. Value 1 is normal playback speed.
Stereo Pan : Sets the position in the stereo field of 2D sounds.
Spatial Blend : Sets how much the 3D engine has an effect on the audio source.
Reverb Zone Mix : Sets the amount of the output signal that gets routed to the reverb zones.
 The amount is linear in the (0 - 1) range, but allows for a 10 dB amplification in the (1 - 1.1) 
range which can be useful to achieve the effect of near-field and distant sounds.

* The Audio Low Pass Filter passes low frequencies of an AudioSource
* The Audio High Pass 
Filter passes high frequencies of an AudioSource
* The Audio High Pass Filter passes high frequencies of an AudioSource

* The Audio Chorus Filter takes an Audio Clip and processes it creating a chorus effect.


MaxDistance : The distance from the centerpoint that the reverb will not have any effect. Default = 15.0.
MinDistance : The distance from the centerpoint that the reverb will have full effect at. Default = 10.0.

Room : Room effect level (at mid frequencies).
RoomHF : Relative room effect level at high frequencies.
RoomLF : Relative room effect level at low frequencies.

DecayHFRatio : High-frequency to mid-frequency decay time ratio.
DecayTime : Reverberation decay time at mid frequencies.
Reflections : Early reflections level relative to room effect.
Reverb : Late reverberation level relative to room effect.
HFReference : Reference high frequency (hz).
LFReference : Reference low frequency (hz).
Diffusion : Value that controls the echo density in the late reverberation decay.
Density : Value that controls the modal density in the late reverberation decay.

title: Hearing Training
description:
Hearing training is a game learning app that improves your hearing by letting you enjoy the game as you earn a high score with correct answers.

The goal is to hear the correct word as often as possible.

This game was created specifically for hearing impaired individuals who recently received a cochlear implant or recently were fitted with hearing aids. The app will enunciate English words and you must select the correct word that you heard.

A hearing person may also use this app for their own entertainment.

title: Rexton App
description:
The Rexton App enables users of Rexton hearing aids, purchased 2014 or later, to adapt these safely and conveniently to their individual requirements and to adjust and control them.
In addition, the Rexton App includes various services and functions that support or automatically take over the extended use of your hearing aids.

All features and services are subject to the following factors:
- brand, type and platform of the hearing aid
- specific functions supported by the hearing aid
- services offered by the brand or distributor
- country-specific availability of services


Basic functions of the Rexton App:
With the Rexton App the hearing aid wearer can use a smartphone to remote control the paired hearing aids. The Rexton App also offers a comfortable range of functions for simple devices in the entry-level segment, e.g.

- various listening programs
- tinnitus signal
- volume control
- sound balance


Hearing aid-dependent functions of the app:
Depending on the technical equipment of the hearing aids and depending on the default functions of the provider, the Rexton App allows the following functions to be controlled, like

- directional hearing
- separate adjustment of both hearing aids
- muting the hearing aids
- volume control
- motion sensor

... as well as displaying and setting the battery charge status, warning signals, device usage and statistics for user satisfaction


Services at a glance
The availability of the listed services and features depends on the make and model of the hearing aid, distribution channel, country / region and service package.



Hearing success lessons
In addition to the initial adjustment of the hearing aid, the examination of the settings for the hearing success of the patient is significantly important. Based on a questionnaire available in the Rexton App, the hearing aid wearer can also document and continuously check the status and success of his hearing success to his audiologist.

In addition to the initial adjustment of the hearing aid, the examination of the settings for the hearing success of the patient is significantly important. Based on a questionnaire available in the Rexton App, the hearing aid wearer can also document and continuously check the status and success of his hearing success to his audiologist.
summary: Rexton - remote Control for your hearing aid
recentChanges:
- bug fixes
- updated information
comments: I've had these hearing aids 2 months, so far so good, using the app only shows me volume and direction, not how to correct the tinny buzz at times. I'll ask about it when I get them cleaned.
App worked okay but hearing aids keep dropping the programs. After a few reloads, the app wouldn't read the QR code so had to go back to hearing center for reload.
Useless. The battery function is awful. Can barely if at all hear the signal. No useful instructions.

This is the only Sivantos app I can get to work and pair with my aids. I just want to use it to check volume levels and battery status and it does that seemlessly for me. (Android 10 on Huawei device).

Not for newer Android phones it only supports up to s10 or note 8 while I have note 9 so the only way I was able to pair was through a qr code.Rexton need to upgrade the app for latest Android n Apple models.

title: Test My Hearing
description:
NOTE ==> USE HEADPHONES 

The test is based on the examination of hearing which is called Pure Tone Audio(PTA),
It will give you a diagram of Your hearing in both of your ears.

Q&A
How to make the test?
Just use any android device with plug in earphones and put the sound to the 
highest degree then follow the steps.

Can I save my final diagram?
Yes You can save your Audiogram as screenshots.

Will the final result of a hearing test be the same to the PTA specialists tests?
No,But certainly the result should be fairly close to the specialist examination 
depending on the type of mobile phone and the earphones and the status during the examination process.
NOTE ==> USE HEADPHONES

recentChanges: Android Permissions
comments: Even though I haven't tried the app yet, with the headset on, even through my phone speaker it is obvious to me this is a well-thought-out and professionally-made app to test your hearing. It's become harder & harder over time for me to understand other people speaking. Wondering whether those frequencies are getting harder me to be able to hear. Even with my phone speaker; I found out that it's true. (I looked up the frequencies of average human speech on a medical website)

First off, this is the best free hearing test app available. No doubt about that, and a comparison to my actual hearing test from my audiologist shows a startling accuracy that I was not expecting. This app does however have a couple of areas where improvements can be made, including server connectivity problems and occasional loud hissing/static if the Hz are out of your device's threshold. But seriously, if used correctly, this app is incredibly accurate, especially for no money! Recommended.

Great APP, I like it so far, Default calibration for original headset works accurate. Results give you a good idea of hearing status according to user age. I get recurrent hearing test, that's why I would recommend the developer to add an "ear selection" button; a "Sound" ON OFF button; Frequency selector button & volume control. This will give the APP the ability to test randomly each ear and to test someone else by instruct the person under test to indicate which ear hear a sound.

The biological calibration process is fairly tedious, but wow it works. Using this app to self test, I received results very similar to those in a professional test booth. The fact that you can then choose recent calibration coefficients to apply to new tests means you only need to sit through the calibration process if you change headphones. This app is an excellent product.

I give this app 5 stars for a very good experience. I've tested my young family, showing very plausible results. As an audio setup I've used a Bluetooth receiver with aptX HD, and the headset Cross from Roccat. Please don't use the phones analog audio output, since it can have very poor quality (signal to noise ratio for liw volume tones).

title: Hearing from God
description: This app's purpose is to challenge individuals to incline their spiritual ears to hear God as the Bible says that His sheep hear His voice.  By inquiring of God daily for 30 days and asking Him specific questions, you will develop your spiritual ears to hear God's heart and allow Him to show you what's in yours.  There is a place to include notes to write what God is speaking to you.  Enjoy this journey to deeper intimacy with God.

title: Super Hearing Sound Magnifier
description:
Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder is the ultimate super hearing aid and hearing amplifier that amplifies external sound using headset microphone or phone mic and streams to headset for super hearing with your ears.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder uses hearing amplifier that captures and amplifies sound and streams to your Bluetooth headset for super hearing.
 
Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder contains a built-in Sound Booster that lets you adjust and enhance the quality of sound feedback.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder helps restore normal hearing levels against hearing loss so you can hear better, communicate effectively, know what's going on around you and eliminate danger.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder supports Bluetooth Headset (Wireless headset) and Wired headsets, so you can utilize the hearing amplifier as an alternative hearing aid when you lose your prescribed medical hearing aid from your audiologist.

Use Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder to amplify sound from your Television, Radio, Speakers, environments, etc. for super hearing while you relax, work out, or do your daily tasks.

Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder is the latest super hearing aid and hearing amplifier designed for amplified hearing on android. Utilize its sound amplifier features to boost sound for your ears and experience better hearing.

WHY SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER RECORDER?
1. Hear better during meetings and conversations with friends and family.
2. Boost sound for super hearing during events where the speaker is far away.
3. Amplify sound from your Television, Radio, etc. for super hearing.
4. Hearing aid to restore normal hearing against hearing loss.
5. Emergency hearing aid when you lose your medical hearing aid device.
6. Experience the power of a super hearing amplifier for android.

FEATURES OF SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER 
1. Clear Sound Output
2. Bluetooth & Wired Headsets
3. Echo Cancellation
4. Noise Suppression
5. Sound Equalizer
6. Bass Booster
7. MP3 Sound Recorder
8. Automatic Gain Control
9. Graphic Virtualizer
10. Volume Controller
11. Wave Visualizer
12. Save & Load Configurations

HOW TO USE SUPER HEARING SOUND MAGNIFIER 
1. Connect your wired headphones or Bluetooth headset. If using bluetooth headset, ensure Bluetooth is switched on and your hearing device is properly connected to your phone. You can play music to test its functionality.
2. Launch Super Hearing Sound Magnifier and tap "Listen" to start the hearing amplifier.
3. Place phone near source of sound for hearing amplifier to detect and amplify sound.
4. Listen to the amplified sound coming through your wired or Bluetooth headset.

Disclaimer: Use Super Hearing Sound Magnifier Recorder to amplify sound from your surroundings for better hearing, not to replace your medical hearing aid device from your audiologist. Consult your physician if you're experiencing hearing loss or hearing difficulty.

title: myHearing
description:
In order to perfectly adjust your hearing aids to your individual needs, your Hearing Care Professional requires detailed information about your experience with your hearing aids. myHearing provides you with a platform to rate your hearing in real-world listening situations. Once you enter your responses, your Hearing Care Professional receives this information instantly with a simple touch of a button. Your Hearing Care Professional can use your responses to better adjust the settings of your hearing aids (1). 
 
Additionally, hearing exercises help to accelerate the adaptation process. All the while, your Hearing Care Professional is just a touch of a button away, via phone or chat messaging (2). Using this App, you will be able to experience a free on-demand video consultation from your personal Hearing Care Professional (3).
 
With myHearing, you are in control of your hearing aids. Easily adjust settings with your smartphone, just like a remote control (4). Manually switch between programs, adjust the volume, or balance the high and low frequencies. 
 
Moreover, you will receive useful advice about usage and care of your hearing aids, and learn interesting facts about hearing in general. 
The App also displays your daily wearing time, sound exposure, and the listening effort (5).
 
Start your journey now to explore your new experience with myHearing. 
 
Intended use: 
The myHearing App is a tool whereby the patient can adjust convenience functions of a hearing aid, within a framework given by a hearing health professional, including Audiologist, ENT or acoustician. 
 
Device compatibility: 
myHearing App is compatible with any Android device running Android 4.4.2 or higher public release. 
 
Control Signals: 
The myHearing app generates short control signals which are designed to be played through the devices speakers and may be audible. 
 
To ensure correct operation and for safety reasons: 
1. While using the app do not hold the loudspeaker of this device to your ears or the ears of others. 
2. While using the app do not use the device with headphones, headsets, or other audio playback devices. 
 
PLEASE CAREFULLY READ THE MANUAL OF THE HEARING AIDS BEFORE USING THIS APP. 
 
About myHearing:
Passion, courage, and especially a vision for the future are the basis of continuous innovation and improvement. With myHearing, we are looking ahead and pushing the limits of technology in order to help people hear what is really important to them. User-friendliness, reliability, and accuracy form the basis of all myHearing products – at the highest level. 
The vision of myHearing combined with Siemens’ experience provide a diverse portfolio of highly developed hearing solutions for you. 

In case of any questions or comments, please contact us at apps@sivantos.com 
For our data privacy policy, please check https://media.sivantos.com/apps/privacy/en/privacy.html
Can also be found under these words: siegnia, siknia, singia, signa 

(1) To access the App an invitation or code is required from your Hearing Care Professional.
(2) Available only if simultaneously applied by your Hearing Care Professional.
(3) Android – Minimum version required Android  5.0.1 or higher.
(4) Remote adjustments by the Hearing Care Professional and user control over hearing aid settings are only possible with Siemens and Signia 7px, 5px, 3px, 7bx, 5bx, 3bx, Orion 2, Sirion 2 & Signia Nx devices. 
(5) Available only for Bluetooth hearing aids. Android minimum versions required: Android 6.0.1 or higher for Samsung Galaxy S5 – SM-G900F and Samsung Galaxy S6 – SM-920I;   Android 7.0 or higher for Samsung Galaxy S8 – SM-G950F, Samsung Galaxy S8 (USA) – SM-G950U, Samsung Galaxy S7 – SM-G930F, Samsung Galaxy S7 (USA) – SM-G930V, Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge – SM-G935F, Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge – SM-G925F, and Android 7.1.1 or higher for Google Nexus 6P.

Sivantos GmbH is a trademark licensee of Siemens AG
Sivantos GmbH, Henri-Dunant-Strasse 100, 91058 Erlangen, Germany

title: Hearing Aid Master (Crystal)
description:
Hearing Aid Master amplifies sound from the microphone straight to your headphones to give enhanced hearing. It works like a hearing aid and headphones are required to avoid echoes. App amplifies magnitude of the voice signal  to help hear things that may be difficult to hear or understand. Hearing Aid Master is implemented by four Hearing aid algorithms  in order to make amplified voice clear. Please provide us feedback so that we can improve the algorithm to make it better. Thank you we always love hearing from you.

■Hearing Aid Master App Features:
--------------------------------------
★ Amplify sound.
★ High sample rate 41000 khz.
★ Set Right Ear Volume
★ Set Left Ear Volume
★ Four Hearing Algorithms

■How to use Hearing App:
--------------------------------------
★Place the earphones or headphones into your ears.
★ Select Amplification Algorithm.
★ Start raising amplification knob to amplify voice to get better hearing.
★ Start Hearing Aid.
★ You can also set left and right ear volumes.

This App is working properly with earphones only. Audio latency depends on the model of your device and firmware version of the mobile phone.

Advertising Policy Disclosure:
We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. 
In order to keep our development running, Hearing Aid Master is ad-supported to generate some revenue.
Thank you for understanding.

Disclaimer
This app makes sounds very loud. Use common sense and caution. When you download and install this software, you agree that you are going to use this application on your own risk. In no event shall developer be liable for any damages including personal injuries and health damage caused by using this application Please consult your doctor before using this application.

comments: Tried at least 8 different hearing aid apps here in google play but this one stands out as the best in sound amplification. Though I like the UI of others with equalizers but they're too weak. Another good one stops when the screen locks. So, I've finally chosen this app. It only lacks equalizer and a volume control while in use. I wish the developer would come out with an update with incorporated equalizer and volume control as the volume control of this version can only be adjusted before using.

Obviously those who require hearing assistance will have a range of hearing impairment and I think it's unreasonable that there should be those who complain about these apps not doing enough. Personally, using a Samsung Galaxy 7 series phone, I have found this app to be tremendously beneficial and I am sincerely impressed with it and to the extent that I'm taking the time to write this review. I wish to thank the app developer for having done such a fine job, thank you.

I would give this app 4.5 stars, if it had the feature of TURNING the F*** OFF when headphones are disconnected. (Warning, will very loudly feedback) And 5 stars if somewhere is explained what gold silver copper & iron are. ---@ all those who complain about delay. That's not their fault, programs only run as well, as is good the hardware running it. For me, the delay is about 1-2 seconds. - - Other than that, this app is the best I've found for listening to your surroundings. No other ones (of which I encountered) have the ability to control the decible amplification as clearly as this one. - - Give 6 stars, and my soul, if you could use the next & previous song buttons to control the amplification during listening, and play/pause button to turn on and off.
The app won't even start. Supplies me with an ad though before it crashes at startup, oh yeah. Good grief
yet another with huge delay and echo. junk... yes junk...

Start your journey now to explore your new experience with Signia myHearing.

Intended use:
The Signia myHearing App is a tool whereby the patient can adjust convenience functions of a hearing aid, within a framework given by a hearing health professional, including Audiologist, ENT or acoustician.

Device compatibility:
The Signia myHearing App is compatible with any Android device running Android 4.4.2 or higher public release.

Control Signals:
The Signia myHearing app generates short control signals which are designed to be played through the devices speakers and may be audible.

To ensure correct operation and for safety reasons:
1. While using the app do not hold the loudspeaker of this device to your ears or the ears of others.
2. While using the app do not use the device with headphones, headsets, or other audio playback devices.

PLEASE CAREFULLY READ THE MANUAL OF THE HEARING AIDS BEFORE USING THIS APP.

About Signia myHearing:
Passion, courage, and especially a vision for the future are the basis of continuous innovation and improvement. With Signia myHearing, we are looking ahead and pushing the limits of technology in order to help people hear what is really important to them. User-friendliness, reliability, and accuracy form the basis of all Signia myHearing products – at the highest level.
The vision of Signia myHearing combined with Siemens’ experience provide a diverse portfolio of highly developed hearing solutions for you.

In case of any questions or comments, please contact us at apps@sivantos.com
For our data privacy policy, please check https://media.sivantos.com/apps/privacy/en/privacy.html
Can also be found under these words: siegnia, siknia, singia, signa

(1) To access the App an invitation or code is required from your HCP.
(2) Available only if simultaneously applied by your HCP.
(3) Android – Minimum version required Android 5.0.1 or higher.
(4) Remote adjustments by the HCP and user control over hearing aid settings are only possible with Siemens and Signia 7px, 5px, 3px, 7bx, 5bx, 3bx, Orion 2, Sirion 2 & Signia Nx devices.
(5) Available only for Bluetooth hearing aids. Android minimum versions required: Android 6.0.1 or higher for Samsung Galaxy S5 – SM-G900F and Samsung Galaxy S6 – SM-920I; Android 7.0 or higher for Samsung Galaxy S8 – SM-G950F, Samsung Galaxy S8 (USA) – SM-G950U, Samsung Galaxy S7 – SM-G930F, Samsung Galaxy S7 (USA) – SM-G930V, Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge – SM-G935F, Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge – SM-G925F, and Android 7.1.1 or higher for Google Nexus 6P.

Sivantos GmbH, Henri-Dunant-Strasse 100, 91058 Erlangen, Germany

title: Hearing Test
description:
It's recommended that you listen to this using headphones
By listening to specific sound frequency you should be able to determine your hearing level. 

Audiograma is a graph showing the hearing ability of a person and the degree of hearing loss in both ears. At the top of the chart, the numerical values range from 125 to 8000. These numbers represent frequencies, or different pitches.

You are able to determine your age as well by frequency you are hearing. The younger you are the lowest frequency you hear. 

The hearing level can vary because of your age or hearing condition.

CAUTION:
This app  generates  sound frequencies beyond the limits of human hearing. Please avoid unnecessary  exposure time to this sound.

title: Hearing Amplifier
description:
Hearing Amplifier is designed to filter and amplify sound and boost environmental hearing, especially people with hearing loss. 

Hearing Amplifier uses headphone microphone and phone microphone to detect and amplify sound from your surroundings to help you hear better.

Use Hearing Amplifier to boost sound from devices such as Television, Radio, Speaker, Laptop, etc. and improve sound clarity during recreational activities like bird-watching.

Hearing Amplifier can be used in classrooms, churches, meetings, conferences or any setting where you are a distance away from the speaker. It supports Bluetooth and wired headsets.

Hearing Amplifier fine-tunes, augments and amplifies sound to help you communicate effectively and eliminate danger. 

Hearing Amplifier’s sound amplification improves your ability to hear sound without disturbing sleepers.

Hearing Amplifier helps individuals with hearing loss hear better in small group settings and one-on-one conversations.

Hearing Amplifier is an everyday companion for millions of people during conversations at work, and with friends and family.

Use Bluetooth headphones to avoid carrying your phone around.
 
WHY USE HEARING AMPLIFIER
1. Proper hearing leads to better communication.
2. Hearing well leads to positive attitude towards life.
3. Better sound produces better music and video experience.
4. Hearing using Bluetooth connection lets you put your phone away.
5. Better hearing lowers stress levels.
6. Hearing well makes you confident.
7. Enhanced hearing lets you grab opportunities and makes you successful.
8. Better hearing gives the right orientation.
9. Amplified sound lets you detect danger and understand speech.
10. Enjoy natural sounds like birds chirping or leaves rustling.
11. Restore normal hearing levels to help eradicate hearing loss.

HEARING AMPLIFIER FEATURES
1. High-Quality Sound Feedback
2. Echo Cancellation
3. Noise Suppression
4. Sound Recorder
5. Loudness Enhancement
6. Bass Booster
7. Save Configurations
8. Regular Updates

Disclaimer: Hearing Amplifier is not a replacement for medical hearing aids, so always use your medical hearing aid. Consult your audiologist if you’re experiencing hearing loss.

title: Unitron Remote Plus
description:
The Unitron Remote Plus app is a remote control for your hearing aids and so much more. Timely notifications help you learn how to use and care for your hearing aids and you can send feedback directly to your hearing care professional, so they can personalize your devices at the next visit.

The Remote Plus app allows you to:
-   Control volume
-   Change programs
-   Mute and unmute
-   Adjust the equalizer settings*
-   Remote adjust*
-   Receive coach notifications on how to care and maintain for your hearing aids
-   Submit ratings on the hearing instrument experience
-   Watch how-to videos
-   Adjust the ambient balance for streaming
-   Adjust tinnitus masker intensity
-   Access to status information such as battery state of charge and wearing time

The Remote Plus app is compatible with Unitron hearing aids with Bluetooth connectivity.
Compatible models:
DX Moxi Move R
DX Moxi Jump R T
DX Moxi Fit
DX Stride P R
DX Stride M
DX Insera W 312 Dir
D Moxi Jump R
D Moxi Jump R T
D Moxi Fit
D Stride P R
T Moxi All

*The equalizer and remote adjust work on Discover Next (DX) hearing instruments only.

Smartphone compatibility: 
If you want to check if your smartphone is compatible, please visit our compatibility checker:  
https://www.unitron.com/global/en_us/help-and-support/bluetooth-support/phone-compatibility.html
